scripts.docker:build:api: cd ../ && docker build --no-cache -t hebo-api -f infra/stacks/build-service/Dockerfile --build-arg SERVICE=api --build-arg WORKSPACE=@hebo/api --build-arg PORT=3001 .
scripts.docker:build:gateway: cd ../ && docker build --no-cache -t hebo-gateway -f infra/stacks/build-service/Dockerfile --build-arg SERVICE=gateway --build-arg WORKSPACE=@hebo/gateway --build-arg PORT=3002 .
scripts.ecr:login: aws ecr-public get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin public.ecr.aws
scripts.ecr:setup:api: aws ecr-public create-repository --repository-name hebo/api --region us-east-1 || true
scripts.ecr:setup:gateway: aws ecr-public create-repository --repository-name hebo/gateway --region us-east-1 || true
